name: SINK (itch) (Mateo_Langlois)
description:
During an urbex in a bunker, you break a ladder, disallowing you to go back to where you came from 

Will you advance into the bunker, and fight your traumas, or will you die in there, unable to find the exit ?

A game made by a team of five people:

-Matéo Langlois

-Médéric Cardon

-Éloi Michel

-Maxime Hemon

-Thibaud Le Roy
